communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please conduct a search for responsive records and hereby request the following:

Any and all records mentioning, relating to, or generated as a result of investigation into Monty V. (Valentino) Massimi. 

Monty's DOD is April 7, 2007.  See: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/monty-massimi-obituary?id=4686304

Monty was murdered by Salvatore "Sam" M. Vacanti at Jacobi Restaurant.  
See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-monty-massimi-shot/148744554/
See Also: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-sam-vacanti-arrested-fo/148744717/
See Also: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-sam-vacantis-bail-revo/148744889/

Additionally, Monty was close with LCN Figures:

1. Frank "Butch" BiFulco (Buffalo LCN Family). BiFulco's DOD is October 12, 2020. See: https://buffalonews.com/obituaries/frank-butch-bifulco-75-reputed-mobster-with-a-brilliant-mind/article_1165f678-1ab8-11eb-a55c-130105cb65b9.html See also: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/frank-bifulco-obituary?id=4880120

2. Vincent "Jimmy" Caci (Los Angelos  LCN  Family). Caci's DOD is August 16, 2011. See: https://buffalonews.com/obituaries/caci-vincent-d-jimmy/article_af51bceb-59cd-581c-9ed9-ac04a187523a.html See also: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/vincent-caci-obituary?id=4763396. Attached is a picture of Monty Massimi with Vincent "Jimmy" Caci

3. Stephen Cino (Los Angelos LCN Family). Cino's DOD is March 11. 2013. See: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/lvrj/name/stephen-cino-obituary?id=20533344

4. Anthony "Tony" Alessi (Buffalo LCN Family). Alessi's DOD is June 19, 2008. See: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/anthony-alessi-obituary?id=4699991

In addition to conducting this search for records at the FBI Field Office in Buffalo, NY, please conduct an additional search of the Central Records System, including but not limited to the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices, for both main-file records and cross-reference records for all relevant names, individuals, agencies and companies at FBI Headquarters. Please also conduct a search for records at the Alexandria Records Center. If any potentially responsive records have been destroyed and/or transferred to NARA, then I request copies of the destruction or transfer slips as well as any other documentation relating to, mentioning or describing said transfer or destruction, to include but not be limited to confirmation that the Bureau has no other copies of said records. If previously released records are available, then I request a rolling release consisting of those records while additional records are located and processed for release.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mob

communications.subject: Louisiana Public Records Law Request: Untitled
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

We would like to file a request for procuring data from your records for the years 1989 to 1999.
The data describes the various operations of the DA office that covered declinations, convictions and trials. 
We have attached below, a codebook of the variables in the data.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Peter Gehred
